channel.title: me on Life So Far // Days Ahead
channel.description: Recent content in me on Life So Far // Days Ahead

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Why a blog? I’ve come a long ways in my 28 years as a student and professional. I think by now I might have a few ideas of my own to share and offer perspective from my journey. As of today, I work for SpaceX on the Dragon Supply Chain Team as a Buyer for mechanisms and mechanical assemblies. Prior to this, I was a Buyer at Volvo Cars USA, as awell as a Buyer and Engineer for TRU Simulation.
